title: Nicola Peltz wears a skimpy black bra in a costume with blood on her face exiting Delilah in WeHo
text:
She's getting into the late October Halloween spirit.

On Thursday evening actress Nicola Peltz was seen leaving the hip Delilah restaurant in West Hollywood, California, in an edgy and sexy black angel costume.

Peltz, 24, donned a skimpy black bikini top or bra for the outing, which she paired with feathery black angel wings strapped to her back.

Angel of the night: On Thursday evening actress Nicola Peltz was seen leaving the hip Delilah restaurant in West Hollywood

The Last Airbender actress wore black leggings, and applied a streak of fake blood on her cheek that looked like a teardrop to get into the Halloween vibe.

Her eye makeup featured glittery wingtips.

She was on the arm of fellow actor Justin Campbell, who donned a silken pajama robe.

Nicola wore her beautiful blond hair down, parted in the middle.

Costumed couple: Nicola was on the arm of fellow actor Justin Campbell

She sported a large cross necklace, and had a small black bum bag which she carried cross-body style with a chain handle.

Peltz completed the look with quite high black platform boots.

The ex of model Anwar Hadid, Nicola has kept a relatively low profile of late.

After splitting from Anwar last year, she had also been linked to LANY's frontman Paul Klein.

Sexy: She was wearing an edgy and sexy black angel costume

Night wings: Peltz had feathery black angel wings strapped to her back for the look

On the acting front, the Bates Motel star appeared in 2017's limited Marvel series Inhumans, which received mixed reviews.

Peltz does have two new promising projects in pre-production though, including the TV series When the Street Lights Go On, centered around the murder of a young girl and teacher.

That series will costar Queen Latifah.

The other project is called Above The Line, a drama which will also star Taryn Manning and Thomas Middleditch.
description: On Thursday evening actress Nicola Peltz was seen leaving the hip Delilah restaurant in West Hollywood, California, in an edgy and sexy black angel costume.
